text: Sorry to bump an old thread, but did anyone here arrive at a sound solution for the missing `x-HubSpot-signature` in Serverless Requests? Itâ€™s also making me feel a bit icky.

Hi all. New here and still learning the basics, but wondered if anyone might be able to help troubleshoot an error I've been facing when attempting to configure a *deal* *tab* *CRM* *card* using `CrmAssociationPropertyList` to show its associated Line Items (with end goal of being able to amend Line Item properties from within it).

I keep being faced with the following error, and the Log Output saying "Unable to initialize extension". Any ideas on why this error might be showing would be hugely appreciated!
are you able to run the extension locally using hs project dev?
Hey Ryan, thanks for your response! It still throws up a similar error when developing locally
what is showing in your terminal?
Might this help? Thanks for bearing with me, bit of a newbie!
no worries - been there and now I'm paying it forward
There is something wrong with the project structure based on that message.  Are you able to share your project via git?
I need to see the folder structure and the file where you are calling HubSpot.extend
